## Overview of Cain & Abel

Cain & Abel is a legendary Windows-based password recovery tool that provides comprehensive password retrieval and network analysis capabilities for security professionals and researchers.

![Cain & Abel Interface](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/f7/Cain-abel.png)

### Key Capabilities

-   **Multiple password recovery methods**
-   **Network sniffing and analysis**
-   **Cryptanalysis support**
-   **Windows hash extraction**
-   **Advanced decoding utilities**
